author: oghma48
content:
Hi!
I’m trying to run https://github.com/eth-act/zkevm-benchmark-workload using the exact same block set as the proving runs here: https://eth-act.github.io/zkevm-benchmark-runs/benchmarks/?mode=proving.

The rpc provider that I'm using doesn’t expose `debug_executionWitnessByBlockHash`. Do you already have those blocks saved somewhere and can share them? (if possible I would avoid to spin up a reth node)
